### Standalone installation

Install the latest version of operetta-compose from PyPI:

```{python, eva=false}
pip install operetta-compose
```


### Fractal installation

From a [Fractal](https://fractal-analytics-platform.github.io/) server collect the package from PyPI with `operetta-compose` and indicate the desired version number.
